FuncDef: This command specifies the aging timer per proxy-ARP/proxy-ND entry for dynamic entries. When the aging expires, the entry is flushed. The age is reset when a new ARP/GARP/NA for the same MAC-IP is received. If the corresponding FDB MAC entry is flushed, the proxy-ARP/proxy-ND entry goes inactive and subsequent ARP/NS lookups are treated as "missed". EVPN will withdraw the IP-MAC if the entry goes inactive. Theage-timeshould be set atsend-refresh * 3to ensure that no active entries are unnecessarily removed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the age-time in seconds. Values-60 to 86400.
